text: Taylor Swift has never spoken about Joe Alwyn publicly, but they ’ re apparently a couple — and they ’ ve been together for anywhere from one to two years. Swift has been uncharacteristically quiet about her relationship with Alwyn. The paparazzi photo ops of her Hiddleswift days and the couply Instagram pics she ’ d post with Calvin Harris are nowhere to be found. In fact, Swift rarely uses her social media for anything other than promoting her tours and performances these days. Still, we ’ ve managed to eke out a few details of Swift and Alwyn ’ s relationship. Here ’ s a timeline of their coupledom. May 2, 2016 : They meet at the Met Gala ( probably ). Nobody knows for sure when Taylor and Joe first met. But
